arts.ttl: Wayne Rooney urged to resign as hapless Plymouth ship TEN goals in just two games
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney is still yet to lead Plymouth Argyle to an away win this season, with his side being battered once again on the road on Saturday, this time at Bristol City

arts.ttl: Liam Manning sets Anis Mehmeti challenge after 'brave' display in Bristol City win vs Plymouth
arts.sum: While Manning admitted the winger failed to turn "dangerous" possession into chances in City's defeat to Watford last time out, the Reds boss felt his display against Rooney's side showed his willingness to improve. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.

arts.ttl: Sorry Plymouth thrashed again | Rooney: It was an embarrassment
arts.sum: Pressure piled on Wayne Rooney as his Plymouth team suffered a second-half capitulation in a 4-0 Championship hammering by Bristol City at Ashton Gate.

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs Plymouth Argyle: Anis Mehmeti stands out as Reds secure home win
arts.sum: Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community. Lively as ever down the left-flank to carve out some excellent chances and interchange well with Mehmeti.

arts.ttl: Bristol City pile pressure on Plymouth boss Wayne Rooney
arts.sum: Anis Mehmeti scored twice in a 4-0 win, with all the goals in the second half.

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Plymouth Argyle as Robins seek home win despite quick turnaround
arts.sum: With three games in the space of a week, the 39-year-old may well feel that he needs to make a few changes to freshen up his squad but with one or two players still making their way back from injury, Manning doesn't have loads of options to choose from. Having gone into last weekend's game with Burnley full of positivity, Bristol City head into this afternoon's clash with Plymouth Argyle on the back foot having registered back-to-back defeats for the first time since September.

arts.ttl: 'A new low' - What Bristol City can expect from Plymouth Argyle and Wayne Rooney at Ashton Gate - Bristol Live
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney's side currently sit 20th in the Championship table, two points clear of Hull City who occupy the final relegation position, and are yet to win away from Home Park this season having been beaten 6-1 by Norwich City at Carrow Road last time out. With the defeat to the Hornets now in the rearview mirror, attention turns to Saturday afternoon's showdown with Plymouth Argyle at Ashton Gate as the Robins look to win at home for the first time since September.

arts.ttl: Wayne Rooney sets Plymouth Argyle new challenge ahead of Bristol City clash at Ashton Gate
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney has challenged his Plymouth Argyle side to avoid conceding early on against Bristol City following the Pilgrims' disappointing defeat to Norwich City at Carrow Road last time out. Bristol City Live is now on WhatsApp and we want you to join our community.

arts.ttl: Wayne Rooney's true thoughts about football management as Coleen makes claim
arts.sum: Wayne Rooney is in the midst of his fourth managerial stint in as many years with Plymouth Argyle in the Championship, and wife Coleen has spoken out on his job while on ITV's I'm A Celebrity

arts.ttl: Palsson dropped: Plymouth Argyle team news and predicted XI to face Bristol City
arts.sum: The latest Plymouth Argyle team news as Wayne Rooney's side gear up to face Bristol City in the Championship. The post Palsson dropped: Plymouth Argyle team news and predicted XI to face Bristol City appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
